1. How I can earn with E-Bogger App? \n - You need to monetize your Blogs in order to earn through Blogs. More the Blogs, more the earning!

2. What does it mean to monetize the Blogs? \n - Whenever you create a Blog in E-Blogger Application, we will load your Google AdMob Ad on your Blog. You can not see your own Ad on your own Blog. Other people will be able to see your Ads on your Blogs.

3. Why I can not see my own Ad on my own Blogs? \n - To prevent from invalid clicks and impressions we do not allow users to see their own Ads on their own Blogs. Even the Google AdMob\'s policy has this rule. Google AdMob will block your account if you click on your own Ads and make earnings.

4. What is required to monetize a Blog? \n - All you need is a Google AdMob account with a Banner Ad Unit Id. You need to enter your Banner Ad Unit Id on Monetization section of E-Blogger App and we will handle the rest.

5. How to get Google AdMob Banner Ad Unit Id? 
 - a. Go to "https://apps.admob.com" and create AdMob account. 
 b. Once you create a AdMob account, you will be redirected to Google AdMob console. Open the left panel and click on "Apps". 
 c. Click on "Add Your First App" button. You will be asked, "Have you published your Application on Google Play or the App Store?" - Click "No". 
 d. Give any name to your Application and select platform as "Android". Click "Add" button. 
 e. You will get your AdMob App Id. Now click on "Create Ad Unit" button. 
 f. Select "Banner" as a ad format in the next step. 
 g. Give any name to your Ad Unit. Do not change any advanced settings. 
 h. Once you give name to your Ad Unit, click on "Create Ad Unit" button. 
 i. You are done! You will see your Banner Ad Unit Id. Remember Banner Ad Unit Id is the one which contains "/" in between. 
 Note: If you see "Missing Payment Information" on your Google AdMob homepage then you should add payment info. Google will just ask you for your address in order to receive further communications. If you failed to do this step then you won't receive Ads for your Banner Ad Unit Id.

6. What to do once I have Banner Ad Unit Id? \n - As we said above, Just copy your AdMob banner Ad Unit Id and paste it on Monetization section of E-Blogger App and click Submit. We will remember your Banner Ad Unit Id whenever you create a new Blog and we will load your Ad on your Blogs.

7. What happens when I submit my Banner Ad Unit Id on E-Blogger App? \n - Banner Ad Unit Id is like a container where we will give some space of our application to load Ads in your Banner Ad. That space will be on your Blog, so it is a great tool to monetize and earn throug your Blogs.
8. Is Monetizing a Blog is mandatory to use this E-Blogger App? \n - No. It is not mandatory to monetize your Blogs. You can simply create Blogs as much as you want without having any AdMob account.
9. Can I enter more than one Banner Ad Unit Id on Monetization Screen? \n - No. It is recommended that you should have only one Banner Ad Unit Id associated with one E-Blogger account.
10. Where should I reach if I have doubts/questions? \n - You can reach us at info@eonline.org.in .
